node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `user` ( `user_id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `nick` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `passwd` varchar(127) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `realname` varchar(40) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `email` varchar(40) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `lasttime` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `karma` int DEFAULT '0', `votes` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `experience` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `votesleft` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `imgsrc` varchar(128) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `in_room` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `acctlock` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `merit` float NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `numwriteups` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `validationkey` varchar(70) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `validemail` int DEFAULT '0', `GP` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `sanctity` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `stars` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `session_id` int DEFAULT NULL, `user_salt` int DEFAULT NULL, `salt` varchar(23) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `infected` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `message_forward_to` int DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`user_id`), KEY `email` (`email`), KEY `lasttime` (`lasttime`), KEY `session_id` (`session_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3 COLLATE=utf8mb3_unicode_ci PACK_KEYS=1
node.title: user
